column5: Hills of Romance is our way of life in the Texas hill country. Once here it will be your way of life, not a destination. Allow yourself to enjoy our way of life for a weekend or week. You will never forget your stay at one of our two romantic cabins. Each cabin is hidden in the trees and allows for a private and peaceful stay. Each has a hot tub, pool, fireplace, king bed and fully equipped kitchen. A grill is available as well for that pool side dinner under the stars.
column8: Cozy Cottage at Hills of Romance
